column5: Since barely anyone posts reports anymore, let's just all do a 2012 summary. Summary for my year so far...  Blade baits are golden during the coldwater months    Can't seem to find any spring crappie fishing pictures.... Got a few here and there. Nothing special. Fished for walleye once as well.. Had a few decent fish but no PB's  Got better at fishing for lakers and whities   Jigging for softwater lakers is very similar to ice fishing for them    Figured out how to use a flipping jig(Never got anything over 3 with them though  )   Flipped all summer but got my biggest largemouth on a jerkbait in the early fall...   Fished the OBF this year, and embarassed myself big time.  The dropshot is my #1 Technique.... USE IT MORE.   Found the effectiveness of a football jig   Fall smallies are my absolute favourite thing to target after September. Here's a PB at 6+.   Put a few of non fishing friends onto a few days of decent fishing.     Goals for 2013 - Catch a 5+ Largie - Get better at jigs - Barely did any fall crappie fishing for 2012... Maybe get a few trips in for next year - Learn to fish crankbaits and swimbaits better
Nice Report EC1.  Looks like you got some nice dishing in this year. That's a nice chunk of largie you got on the jerkbait.
Looks like a great year to me!!!
Yep , looks like a great year for you . Thanks for sharing !

nice report....  my 2012 was pretty good, 5 tournies, finished top 3 about 3 times and a big fish.  goals for 2013 is to perfect my new techniques and work on learning lakes.  need to cut some costs, got 6 new combos in 2012!
Some new goals to consider for 2013 - spend less money on TW. - don't feed musky $25 jerkbaits
Nice report and recap. Looks like a great year to me as well.
Lol, I just bought $300 worth of megabass, lc, and rudra's. Almost lost 2 to musky and caught a few lakers on jerk this year

Well, Black Friday 2012 is coming up.... Spend it all then . LOL. Realistically, there is nothing I need for 2012, but I'll be needing a few more tricks up my sleeve for 2013.  And thanks for the feedback guys!
Very nice season so far Bud !!! Great looking fish.
That smallie is a pig! Well done!
What a season!!!!!!!!!!!!!!,congrats:good:
Looks like a great season for sure
Goals for 2013: DON'T CUT YOURSELF WITH THE AUGER ON EVERY TRIP!  Definitely can't wait to get back on the ice again with you. You're the only one who brings a stove and cooks
Edwin, fish my hut on the ice not Will's and you will have a better ice season for sure... BAHAHAHAHAHA  sorry, I just had to...
Looks like quality time spent on the water paid off. Nice fish.
Great year indeed. I'm especially envious of your summer-time whities. That's something I'd also like figure out locally, although find it difficult to even attempt.
Great season for sure!  Thanks for sharing  MTBF
That smallie is huge!  too bad we didn't get to fish together much this year during the softwater season, but i'll see you on the ice!
Some solid fish lad!!!  Great 2012.  That smallie is the gem of 'em all man!  Good luck in the 2013.
Well Done EC1 looks like you smoked em and had alot of fun hey that rhymes
